statements: DELETE FROM patient_vitals WHERE patient_id = 102 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM patient_vitals WHERE temperature > 100 AND blood_pressure = '120/80';
DELETE FROM sensor_logs WHERE sensor_id = 5 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM patient_vitals WHERE patient_id = 123 AND body_temperature > 98.6;
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Heart Rate' AND value < 60;
DELETE FROM blood_pressure WHERE diastolic_pressure > 90 AND systolic_pressure > 140;
